sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WFSPMGroupMembership</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WFSPMGroupMembership</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WFSPMGroupMembership = Class.create();
WFSPMGroupMembership.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    hasGroupMembership: function(dmnGr) {
        var group = dmnGr.u_group;
        if (!gs.nil(group)) {
            var groupStr = group.split(",");
        }

        for (var i = 0; i < groupStr.length; i++) {
            if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf(groupStr[i])) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;

    },

    type: 'WFSPMGroupMembership'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K095239</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-20 17:38:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>176bf6f287aaf510224632650cbb353d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WFSPMGroupMembership</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_176bf6f287aaf510224632650cbb353d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:23:06</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
